preibisch_imagej.render

Interface TextRenderer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DummyTextRenderer

    public interface TextRenderer
    Basic text renderer interface, which renders text into an int[] buffer. Values range from 0 to 255 (for now) and represent grayscale intensities. The buffer is then available afterwards including its dimensions. Users can set font attributes before rendering.
    Author:
    Barry DeZonia
